name: plasma-smart-video-wallpaper-reborn
description: Plasma 6 wallpaper plugin to play videos on your Desktop/Lock Screen.
readme_summary: This repository provides a Plasma 6 wallpaper plugin that allows users to set videos as their desktop or lock screen background. It integrates seamlessly with the KDE Plasma desktop environment to offer dynamic and personalized wallpapers.
primary_use_case: To enable users to set video files as their dynamic desktop and lock screen wallpapers within the KDE Plasma environment.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, modern desktop computer screen displaying a vibrant, dynamic video of a serene landscape as the wallpaper. On the side of the screen, a small, elegant control panel with play/pause buttons and a progress bar is visible, subtly indicating video playback functionality. Floating around the screen are abstract, glowing particles representing digital data and visual effects. The overall aesthetic is clean and futuristic, with a focus on the seamless integration of video into the desktop background. The repository name 'Smart Video Wallpaper Reborn' is subtly etched into the base of the monitor stand. Rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with soft, ambient lighting and a cool color palette.

name: focuswriter
readme_summary: FocusWriter is a distraction-free, fullscreen word processor designed for immersive writing. It offers a minimalist interface that hides away until needed, customizable themes for ambiance, and essential features like spell-checking and document statistics to aid productivity.
key_features: Hide-away UI accessed by mouse movement
primary_use_case: To provide a focused and immersive writing environment, minimizing distractions for users to concentrate on their content.
cover_image_prompt: A serene writer sitting at a desk in a minimalist, softly lit room, completely absorbed in their work on a laptop. The laptop screen glows with a clean, elegant text editor interface, with the surrounding room subtly fading into a soft, dreamy bokeh effect, symbolizing the 'distraction-free' aspect. The writer's focus is the central element, with gentle light rays emanating from the laptop. Subtle digital particles representing words and ideas float around the writer. The overall mood is calm and productive. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic and a warm, inviting color palette.

name: BotCommander
description: âŒ˜ BotCommander - A lightweight web interface for managing multiple Python bots
readme_summary: BotCommander is a lightweight, self-hosted web interface for managing multiple Python bots. It provides a centralized dashboard to monitor bot status, resource usage, and uptime, with functionalities to start, stop, restart, and disable individual bots.
key_features: Automatic startup of all bots on launch
Monitor CPU, memory, and uptime for each bot
Bot management: start, stop, restart, disable
primary_use_case: Managing and monitoring multiple Python bots through a web-based dashboard.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic robot conductor standing on a podium, orchestrating a symphony of diverse, small, colorful Python bots. Each bot is represented as a unique musical instrument (e.g., a drum bot, a trumpet bot). The conductor uses a glowing baton to signal start, stop, and pause commands, with subtle visual cues like musical notes and status lights emanating from the bots. The background is a clean, modern control room with a large screen displaying CPU and RAM usage graphs for each bot. The overall mood is organized and efficient, with a vibrant color palette. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with clear, friendly character designs and subtle tech elements like glowing data streams.

name: refract
description: A policy enforcement service that provides real-time session concurrency control for Xray-core.
readme_summary: Refract is a Go-based policy enforcement service designed to control concurrent user sessions for Xray-core. It achieves this by monitoring access logs and using Linux kernel features like Netlink and IPSet to block unauthorized connections in real-time.
primary_use_case: To enforce session concurrency limits for Xray-core by blocking multiple simultaneous connections from different IPs under the same user identity.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant digital gatekeeper, represented as a stylized knight with a shield made of network packets, standing before a portal labeled 'Xray-Core'. The knight is actively blocking several shadowy figures (representing unauthorized concurrent connections) from entering the portal, while a single, authorized user figure passes through unimpeded. Small, glowing data streams flow from the knight's shield, indicating real-time log analysis and kernel-level enforcement. The background is a clean, abstract digital landscape with subtle code snippets and network icons. The overall mood is secure and efficient, with a focus on clear boundaries and control. Style: 3D isometric illustration with a modern, clean aesthetic and a cool color palette.

name: samurai
description: Simple, yet effective moderator bot for telegram. With reports, logs, profanity filter, anti-spam AI, NSFW detection AI and more :3
readme_summary: Samurai is a Python-based Telegram auto-moderator bot designed to enhance community safety and engagement. It offers features like profanity filtering, AI-powered spam and NSFW detection, a user reputation system, and scheduled announcements.
primary_use_case: Automated moderation and enhancement of Telegram group chats.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant samurai warrior standing guard at the entrance of a bustling Telegram chat, represented as a vibrant digital city. The samurai uses a glowing katana to deflect incoming messages filled with offensive symbols and spam, while allowing positive messages to flow through. A small AI-powered eye symbol hovers near the samurai, scanning profile pictures for threats. Subtle UI elements showing reputation scores and report notifications are integrated into the scene. The overall mood is protective and orderly, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style, emphasizing clarity and the bot's role as a digital guardian.
